metadata.title: CVE-2024-26637 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:ath11k: rely on mac80211 debugfs handling for vif mac80211 started todelete debugfs entries in certain cases, causing a ath11k to crash when ittried to delete the entries later. Fix this by relying on mac80211 todelete the entries when appropriate and adding them from thevif_add_debugfs handler.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26637` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1098.105
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1098.105').
